# hasBytesAvailable

**Type Property**

The stream has bytes to be read.

## Declaration

```swift
static var hasBytesAvailable: CFStreamEventType { get }
```

## Constants

- **openCompleted**: The open has completed successfully.
- **canAcceptBytes**: The stream can accept bytes for writing.
- **errorOccurred**: An error has occurred on the stream.
- **endEncountered**: The end of the stream has been reached.
